content: Which programming language is my favorite?

I don’t have your favorite programming language saved yet. [M1]

## Help me learn
- Tell me your favorite language (e.g., Rust, Python, TypeScript), and I’ll remember it.
- Optional: share why you prefer it or where you use it most (projects, frameworks, tooling).
